dnd_enabled.description: Whether the user's Do Not Disturb mode is enabled

next_dnd_start_ts.description: Unix timestamp of the next scheduled Do Not Disturb period start time

next_dnd_end_ts.description: Unix timestamp of the next scheduled Do Not Disturb period end time

snooze_enabled.description: Whether the user's snooze mode is enabled

snooze_endtime.description: Unix timestamp when the snooze period ends

snooze_remaining.description: Number of seconds remaining in the snooze period

snooze_is_indefinite.description: Whether the snooze period is indefinite (always false)
